a.aria-label: Remote Parent-Teacher Conferences are being held April 2&3! Sign up Image

img.alt: Remote Parent-Teacher Conferences are being held April 2&3! Sign up

a.span: Remote Parent-Teacher Conferences are being held April 2&3! Sign up

p.span: The Superintendent has announced that Parent-Techer Conferences will be held on Thursday, April 2, and Friday, April 3rd. A letter was mailed home to all families with information for Conferences. Please click this article heading for specifics of the letter that details expectations.

a.title: Go to comments for Remote Parent-Teacher Conferences are being held April 2&3! Sign up

a.span: Govenor Pritzker Issues Excutive Order Requiring Residents to "Stay at Home" 3-23-2020

p.span: As part of the announcement he has ordered that schools are closed through April 7th. Read for full letter.
